sen.j: 田中 徳三（たなか とくぞう、1920年9月15日 - 2007年12月20日）は、日本の映画監督。
sen.e: Tokuzo TANAKA (September 15, 1920- December 20, 2007) was a Japanese film director.
Tokuzo TANAKA (September 15, 1920- December 20, 2007) was a Japanese film director.
Tokuzo TANAKA (September 15, 1920 - December 20, 2007) was a Japanese film director.
sen.cmt: スペース補足しました。

sen.e: Biography
Biography
Biography

sen.j: 大阪市東区_(大阪市)（現・中央区_(大阪市)）船場_(大阪市)出身。
sen.e: He came from Higashi Ward (Eastern Ward), Osaka City (current Senba, Chuo Ward (Central Ward), Osaka City).
He came from Higashi Ward (Eastern Ward), Osaka City (current Senba, Chuo Ward (Central Ward), Osaka City).
He came from Higashi Ward (Eastern Ward), Osaka City (current Senba, Chuo Ward (Central Ward), Osaka City).

sen.j: 関西学院大学文学部卒、1948年大映入社。
sen.e: He graduated from School of Humanities, Kansai Gakuin University, before starting work in Daiei Motion Picture Company in 1948.
He graduated from the School of Humanities, Kansai Gakuin University, before starting work in the Daiei Motion Picture Company in 1948.
He graduated from the School of Humanities, Kansai Gakuin University, before starting work in the Daiei Motion Picture Company in 1948.

sen.j: 溝口健二らに師事し、助監督を勤めた後に、1958年の『化け猫御用だ』で監督デビュー。
sen.e: He studied under Kenji MIZOGUCHI and worked as an assistant director before making his debut as the director in "Bakeneko Goyoda" (Official Business of Monster Cat).
He studied under Kenji MIZOGUCHI and worked as an assistant director before making his debut as a director in "Bakeneko Goyoda" (Official Business of Monster Cat).
He studied under Kenji MIZOGUCHI and worked as an assistant director before making his debut as a director in "Bakeneko Goyoda" (Official Business of Monster Cat).

sen.j: 勝新太郎主演の悪名、市川雷蔵 (8代目)主演の眠狂四郎映画版 (1963年-1969年)、田宮二郎主演の犬シリーズなどの人気作のメガホンを取る。
sen.e: He directed popular works such as the film adaptation of Nemuri Kyoshiro played by Shintaro KATSU with the notorious name of Raizo ICHIKAWA (eighth), and Dog Series played by Jiro TAMIYA.
He directed popular works such as the film adaptation of Nemuri Kyoshiro played by Shintaro KATSU with the notorious name of Raizo ICHIKAWA (eighth), and the Dog Series played by Jiro TAMIYA.
He directed popular works such as the film adaptation of Nemuri Kyoshiro played by Shintaro KATSU with the notorious name of Raizo ICHIKAWA (eighth), and the Dog Series played by Jiro TAMIYA.

sen.j: また、日本映画全盛期にプログラムピクチャーを手掛けていただけあってその参加作品数は、同年代の映画監督と比べて膨大。
sen.e: He contributed program picture (a short film used to fill blank time between films) at the height of Japanese film, and the number of the films he participated in was great compared to the film director of same generation.

He contributed program pictures (a short film used to fill blank time between films) at the height of Japanese film, and the number of the films he participated in was great compared to film directors of the same generation.

He contributed program pictures (a short film used to fill blank time between films) at the height of Japanese film, and the number of the films he participated in was great compared to film directors of the same generation.

sen.j: 大映倒産後はフリーとなり、映画だけでなく、テレビドラマの監督も多数務めた。
sen.e: After the Daiei went into bankruptcy, he went on the path of a freelance and directed not only films but many television drama.
After Daiei went into bankruptcy, he went on the path of a freelancer and directed not only films but many television dramas.
After Daiei went into bankruptcy, he went on the path of a freelancer and directed not only films but many television dramas.

sen.j: 2007年12月20日、脳出血のため奈良県橿原市の病院で死去。
sen.e: He suffered from intracranial hemorrhage and passed away in Kashihara City, Nara Prefecture on December 20, 2007.
He suffered from intra-cranial hemorrhaging and passed away in Kashihara City, Nara Prefecture on December 20, 2007.
He suffered from intra-cranial hemorrhaging and passed away in Kashihara City, Nara Prefecture on December 20, 2007.

sen.j: 同年に撮影した『少年河内音頭取り物語』（河内家菊水丸の少年期の実話）が遺作となった。
sen.e: The film he took in the same year, "Shonen Kawachi ondotori monogatari" (teenage folk dancer and singer of Kawachi City, Osaka Prefecture) (the biography of Kikusuimaru KAWACHIYA in his teenage years) became his last work.

The film he took in the same year, "Shonen Kawachi ondotori monogatari" (teenage folk dancer and singer of Kawachi City, Osaka Prefecture) (the biography of Kikusuimaru KAWACHIYA in his teenage years) became his last work.

The film he took in the same year, "Shonen Kawachi ondotori monogatari" (teenage folk dancer and singer of Kawachi City, Osaka Prefecture) (the biography of Kikusuimaru KAWACHIYA in his teenage years)became his last work.
